DOC.brief_summary: This study examine impact manual physical therapy endocrine function woman diagnose infertile due elevate follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level ( 10 mIU/mL high ) day 2-5 menstrual cycle . It hypothesize manual physical therapy decrease FSH level .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Manual Physical Therapy Improve Endocrine Levels Women
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate effect manual physical therapy endocrine level woman comparison pre- post- treatment hormone level ( FSH , LH Estradiol ) . Secondary measure include assessment pain sexual function via questionnaire . Hormones measure prescribed time point : - baseline : 30-60 day treatment - pre-treatment : 7-30 day treatment - post treatment 1 : 10-30 day post treatment - post treatment 2 : 30-60 day post treatment Pain sexual function questionnaire complete : - baseline : 30-60 day treatment - pre-treatment : 7-30 day treatment - post treatment 1 : 30 day post treatment - post treatment 2 : 60 day post treatment
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed infertile FSH great 10mIU/mL day 25 menstrual cycle Regular menstrual cycle Residing US , accessible LabCorp test facility Active infection include HIV inflammation Cancer within past 5 year Currently pregnant Hemophilia , abnormal bleed clot disorder Immune system disorder Abnormal ovarian cyst endometrioma BMI 35 great Any condition deep manual physical therapy contraindicate Currently take fertility medication plan take fertility relate medication course study . This include ovarian stimulating medication , artificial hormone birth control medication . Participation assist reproductive technique ( IVF ) intrauterine insemination course study .
